programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks.

programme.title: Mann & Wife
programme.desc: The family becomes ill which leaves Daniel to take care of DJ's class assignment to care for an automated doll; Lorraine substitutes for Toni's class and almost costs Toni her job.

programme.title: Mann & Wife
programme.desc: Daniel and Michael are forced to attend communication therapy; the kids fight for equal rights of their household chores.

programme.title: Mann & Wife
programme.desc: Daniel's ex-wife, Michelle, comes to visit and the family anxiously awaits her arrival; Michael's girlfriend has Daniel worried.

programme.title: Mann & Wife
programme.desc: Daniel's brother, Lionel, visits and sibling rivalry takes over; Toni tries to improve the school's dress code.

programme.title: Mann & Wife
programme.desc: Toni wants to join a new church which frustrates Lorraine and a rift runs through the family; DJ has tryouts at school but is a little over-enthusiastic.

programme.title: Mann & Wife
programme.desc: The family learns that a criminal Daniel put away years ago is released and they are concerned for his safety; Toni tries to bond with DJ through video gaming.

programme.title: Mann & Wife
programme.desc: Daniel is hired as a bodyguard for a celebrity singer who drives the family crazy; Terri becomes friends with the mean girls at school, but soon learns the value of real friendship.

programme.title: Mann & Wife
programme.desc: Toni's mother, Carol, visits and clashes with Lorraine; Daniel works on a case that might prevent him from attending Terri's father-daughter dance.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Ashley Biggs thought it was just another pizza delivery, and didn't know who was waiting on the other end; she didn't come back, and police found the delivery address abandoned, with a pool of blood on the ground.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: When teenager Dennis Lewis is killed fighting off home invaders, all police have to go on is a single handprint; when lab results reveal who the print belongs to, no one wants to believe it.

programme.title: The Jennifer Hudson Show
programme.sub-title: Celebrate The Jennifer Hudson Show's 500th Episode!
programme.desc: Maren Morris (album "Dreamsicle"); a first-grade teacher and the student she took to the school's "Sneaker Ball."

programme.title: Tamron Hall
programme.desc: People who have left living large behind; a self-described recovering shopaholic tells of her "No Buy Year"; a woman shares hilarious videos of living in a tiny home; the tiny home community a couple built; HGTV's Poonam Moore.

programme.title: Sherri
programme.desc: Tyler Perry (movie "The Six Triple Eight"); The Temptations perform a holiday classic.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: We're Engaged, You're Still Married?; Unlock: Before She Cheats
programme.desc: On their wedding day, Dina discovered that Shawn was already married; Lex is through with her girlfriend Red's jealous and controlling behavior, but Red says that Lex brought all the discord on herself.

programme.title: Hot Bench
programme.sub-title: Firefighter Dreams, Sister Screams; Pay Me for My Stress!
programme.desc: A woman says her brother gave her a lemon; a waitress sues a bar patron who failed to pay her car registration for her.

programme.title: Hot Bench
programme.sub-title: Rambles About Shambles; When Pit Bulls Attack ... Other Pit Bulls!
programme.desc: A landlord accuses a couple of being deadbeat tenants and leaving their home in shambles; neighbors feud over liability after their pit bulls get into a vicious fight with each other.

programme.title: Couples Court With the Cutlers
programme.desc: A man becomes suspicious that his girlfriend may have taken a lover after leaving him on his birthday to go to Las Vegas; Dr. Heavenly Kimes from "Married to Medicine" helps with the case.

programme.title: Couples Court With the Cutlers
programme.desc: Celebrity guest Judi Jackson ("Bad Girls Club") testifies when a New York woman brings her girlfriend to court with accusations of cheating with a family member.

programme.title: Couples Court With the Cutlers
programme.desc: High school sweethearts' relationship is on the line when they come into the Cutlers' court.

programme.title: Couples Court With the Cutlers
programme.desc: Tired of finding mysterious items all over their apartment, a Texas woman summons her boyfriend to court to prove he's cheating -- and to add insult to injury, he continues to communicate with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: A distressed mother is demanding financial help from the man she claims is the biological father of her child who has a rare medical condition.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: Two weeks after their engagement is called off due to paternity questions, an Alabama woman brings her ex-fiance to court to prove that he is the biological father of her 20-month-old son.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: A paternity bombshell is dropped when an Arkansas woman brings her ex-boyfriend to court to prove that he is the biological father of her 2-month-old daughter.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: A 27-year marriage is on thin ice because a man from California questions the paternity of his 4-year old daughter.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Gillespie and Virgil try to outwit FBI agents who are searching for the man who kidnapped the daughter of District Attorney Darnelle.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Officer Jamison encounters a violent robbery suspect while attempting to rescue an infant from a negligent, alcoholic mother.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Gillespie is leery of the evidence in the murder of an abusive landlord (Hunter Van Leer). Directed by Larry Hagman.

programme.title: Above the Law
programme.desc: A Chicago policewoman (Pam Grier) helps her cynical partner (Steven Seagal) rid his working-class neighborhood of cocaine dealers.

programme.title: Hard to Kill
programme.desc: A policeman (Steven Seagal), who was pronounced dead but lived, eventually recovers with the help of a gorgeous nurse (Kelly LeBrock), and years later he seeks revenge.

programme.title: Bullet to the Head
programme.desc: After his partner is killed, a veteran hit man (Sylvester Stallone) joins forces with a New Orleans detective (Sung Kang) against a ruthless real-estate developer (Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje).
